name: Tile Garden: Tiny Home Design
description:
Classic fun, triple tile match & home design
Playing fun levels with simple game rules puts your mind at ease.

Enjoy this game when your head is complicated after a tiring day.
Playing through fun levels with simple game mechanics will put your mind at ease and relex.

How to play

▪ Find 3 tiles : Tap and match tiles. Match beautiful tiles to clear the game.
▪ Brain training : You can clear complex puzzles by solving fun levels.
▪ Garden decoration : You can design tiny garden with golden tiles.

Hundreds of fun levels and beautiful chapters are updated monthly.
Enjoy the game now
